name: Just Ride：Apparent Horizon 狂飙：极限视界
description: This is a survial game on the road. Driving simulator make life not easy, but equipment will help. Road rage is critical, don't provke cars. Police is a big trouble. Go to wild and discover interesting things. Collect motorcycles reveal the spirit inside them. It is not just ride find out the truth behind.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows7 64 Bit Processor: Intel(r) Core(TM) i5-4210U @1.7GHz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 840M DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 10 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 64 Bit Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-6700K CPU @ 4.00GHz 4.00 Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 10 GB available space
